channel.title: Mining,fletching,smithing
channel.description:
I got 3 skill problems.
Mining: works almost perfect , except if I am mining .. And I step away .. It keeps mining ores on the ground ? :s help me solve this please ?
Fletching: I can fletch , but it frezzes my screen and making me relog. But it levels me up.
Smithing: if I tr to smelt it freezes me and making me reload page.
